that letter neg the other Cl took-3S Juan by the post office

b. En cuanto a ese libro, Juan *(lo) mandó a la biblioteca.
(as for ) that book Juan Cl took-3S to the library
'As for that book, Juan returned it to the library.'

(3) a. En cuanto a ese libro, a esta biblioteca (no a la otra), lo mandó Juan.
(as for ) that book to that library neg to the other Cl took-3S Juan
'As for that book, to that library, not the other one, Juan took it.'
